In this SectionFowler College of BusinesspauseJoin the Fowler Family
Advance Your Career with Fowler CollegeAt SDSU’s Fowler College of Business, our programs are designed to help students build on the set of leadership, analytical, teamwork, and communication-based skills needed to succeed in today’s dynamic business environment. We do this by engaging and collaborating with the San Diego business community and beyond to ensure our curriculum and student experiences are well-mapped to the demands of industry leaders.#6International Business#11Entrepreneurship#35Part-Time MBA ProgramTOPVeteran Friendly School#48Undergraduate Business ProgramsRankings & Reputation


Find Your ProgramUndergraduateGraduate

Who Hires Our Students?

With industry connections around the world, Fowler College of Business has prepared students for recruitment by Fortune 500 companies, small businesses, nonprofits and start-ups for over 50 years. View our Selected Employers page for a list of companies who have hired our students in recent years, categorized by academic program.
SELECTED EMPLOYERS

What do our Alumni Say?
